repairbox.plugin package¶

Submodules¶

repairbox.plugin.base module¶

class repairbox.plugin.base.Plugin¶

Bases: object

attach(container: repairbox.container.BugContainer) → None¶

Used to attach this plugin to a given container.

detach(container: repairbox.container.BugContainer) → None¶

Detaches this plugin from a given container.

interfaces¶

Returns a list of interfaces associated with this plugin.

repairbox.plugin.gcovr module¶

class repairbox.plugin.gcovr.gcovr¶

Bases: repairbox.plugin.base.Plugin

Used to compute line coverage.

attach(container)¶
coverage(container, test)¶

Module contents¶

repairbox.plugin.interface(m)¶

Decorator used to specify that a given Plugin method should be treated as an interface to that plugin.
